short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make DJT Tweets Comic Sans Again

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make tweets by @realDonaldTrump appear in Comic Sans

Updated with fix for (1) need to hit refresh on initial load and (2) to handle the case of scrolling to the end of the twitter page and the dynamic reload. Hat-tip to @andyzei for the fixes! Updated source code at https://github.com/deanhach/TrumpSans
